type: Repair and Maintenance on various File Bays
short_summary: Repair and Maintenance for File Bays
description: Amendment 4 is raised to adjust the closing time of this RFP.>()-> notice of proposed procurement.-> This requirement is for Employment and Social Development Canada.
full_summary:
--------------------------------------------------------

### Repair and Maintenance of File Bays

#### Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01025158
* **Solicitation Number**: 100022184
* **Publication Date**: February 8, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 14, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST (Note: The closing time has been amended)
* **Contracting Authority**: Eric Potvin, nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca

#### Contract Overview

* **Contract Title**: Repair and Maintenance of various File Bays
* **Objective**: Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is seeking a contractor for the repair and maintenance of file bays located in the File Management Centre in Edmonton, Alberta. The contract will involve annual preventative maintenance and on-demand repairs.
* **File Bays**: The contractor will manage four different types of bays: Montel, Spacesavers, SpacePro (Crank), and Spacefile (ACME).
* **Contract Period**: The estimated contract period is from contract award to March 31, 2024, with three additional one-year option periods.

#### Tender Details

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive (Open Bidding)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and others
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Alberta

#### Attachments

The solicitation package can be accessed through the following links:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/09/2589cad82464f421de67dee6154b3f3d/q2-_rfp_100022184.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/27/8ac71a489393a404070b94281b653368/q1-_rfp_100022184.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/08/8f9783077d2754731e74928e50e2dc80/100022184_-_rfp.pdf

#### Important Dates

* **Publication Date**: February 8, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 14,
